name: Heroes of Mavia from Ethereum
description: Forked from Ethereum with Pulsechain. Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0x24fcFC492C1393274B6bcd568ac9e225BEc93584. Heroes of Mavia is a mobile free-to-play Web3 MMO Strategy game developed by Skrice Studios. The game takes place in a fantasy-themed island called Mavia, where players build bases on plots of land and battle neighboring bases and armies to earn in-game resources, such as Gold, Oil and Ruby.
